short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your boring new tab with something cool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An incredible Google Chrome extension for making your boring new tab with something productive.

Key features:
- cool new nature background on every refresh, 
- time display, 
- google search, 
- todo, 
- day focus, 
- the weather display of your location and desired city,
- random inspirational quotes on every refresh

Developers Info:
Ayushi Verma- https://www.linkedin.com/in/ayushi20-19/
